name: Invisibility Cloak
description: A cloak that grants the wearer invisibility for a limited time.
looks: The cloak is made of shimmering fabric that seems to blend into the surroundings.

special_effects.Invisibility: Grants the wearer invisibility for 10 minutes.

name: Speed Elixir
description: An elixir that enhances the drinker's speed and movement abilities.
looks: The elixir is a small, silver flask filled with a sparkling blue liquid.

name: Slow Healing Potion
description: A potion that restores health points.
looks: A small, glass vial filled with a glowing, green liquid.

name: Lightning Bolt Scroll
description: A scroll that allows the user to cast a powerful lightning bolt spell.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment with intricate symbols and runes.

name: Magic Ring
description: A ring infused with magical energy.
looks: The ring is made of silver and has intricate designs engraved on its surface.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: A spell that hurls a bolt of lightning, dealing damage to the target.
looks: The spell appears as a crackling bolt of lightning that shoots from the caster's fingertips.

special_effects.stun: Has a chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.

name: Blade of the Wind
description: A magical sword that harnesses the power of the wind to strike down enemies.
looks: The blade is made of a shimmering silver metal, with intricate carvings of swirling winds along its surface.

special_weapon_skills.Wind Strike: Unleashes a powerful gust of wind with each attack, knocking enemies back.

special_effects.Wind Fury: Increases attack speed by 20% when health is below 50%.

name: Iron Sword
looks: The sword has a straight, double-edged blade with a simple hilt and a leather-wrapped handle.

name: Invisibility Potion
description: A potion that makes the user invisible for a short period of time.
looks: A small, clear glass vial filled with a transparent liquid.

name: Poisoned Dagger
description: A small dagger coated with a deadly poison.
looks: The dagger has a silver blade and a black hilt. The blade is coated with a green, toxic substance.

special_weapon_skills.assassination: Increases critical strike chance and damage.
